articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Cyberattack disrupts check-in systems at major European airports - ABC News - Breaking News, Latest News and Videos
articles.description: A cyberattack targeting check-in and boarding systems has disrupted air traffic at several major European airports
articles.content: BRUSSELS -- A cyberattack targeting check-in and boarding systems disrupted air traffic and caused delays at several of Europes major airports on Saturday, officials said, though the initial impact a… [+2288 chars]
